items.sentence: We went to Tom's house, but unfortunately he wasn't home.
Tom thought Mary did it, even though she said she didn't.
Working on weekends is something that I don't like to do.
There's someone at the front door who wants to thank you.
I saw Tom reading a book in the park yesterday afternoon.
Tom will quite likely be impressed by Mary's performance.
I wanted to change channels, but my wife wouldn't let me.
This flower is yellow and all the other flowers are blue.
Tom appeared to have a particular fondness for squirrels.
Perhaps it might be better to leave before Tom gets here.
